title: darkschneider78
author: darkschneider78
created_time: October 18, 2022, 07:18:02 PMLast edit: October 18, 2022, 08:07:21 PM by darkschneider78
content: A little fun experience when I did withdraw, I understood there was going to be a pending progress before the next step was placed into the tx phase. "Which I have experienced before where the pending progress can take up to 30 mins to a few hours" but this will be a new unethical scheme by BC.GamesThe withdraw I placed was set back into my balance with a fake error window saying Connection reset and Withdraws disabled as shown in the screen shot.I understood the fault is my own as I wanted to prove that they have did this so I would roll more with the balance but of course seeing the non stop reds loosing half the balance.( Note: The withdraws were disabled including tipping, raining etc - this was for 30 mins - So they can verify the bets in the 3rd party providers where they claimed the bets need to be verified at, Majority of my bets were done in their home original games  and only 11.00 ltc was gain from their slot providers.. that's unless the home originals games are run by a 3rd party provider) but they claim the originals are  not 3rd party. Just kind of curious how they weighed out that 11 ltc need to be verified  vs the 100 ltc from their home originals game mines.. From the time frame that was giving, they sorted out all the thousand of bets and contacted the 3rd party provider  had them verify the bets.. " which I think is total bs.. no verification was done all they did was placed the balance back into the balance and did something to make each chance to roll impossible to gain"   " Yes this my assumption on this.. "  If this was the case of verification of bets.. why placed the LTC back into the balance and not have it remain in the pending progress for withdraw?I shared my experienced in their blog post under the games but that comment was removed.. it was pretty straight forward no blasting as most of the comments do  say scam or bs or players venting their frustrations.but after I made that remark.. they tried to make that effort to remove any negative comments/reviewsIf you play at this site.. treat each play with grain of salt, do not let the provably fair bs get to your head thinking " oh its going to happen"  your only gains will probably  be with slot providers or if you find that window open to gain and withdraw.  If you get your withdraw set back into your balance... just wait it out = ),  probably good chanced I will get my account banned after this comment =) https://prnt.sc/eqMV_Nswurvr(print screen photo upload ) https://prnt.sc/eqMV_Nswurvr[url=http://]]]https://prnt.sc/eqMV_Nswurvr(print screen photo upload ) https://prnt.sc/eqMV_Nswurvrhttp://https://prnt.sc/K-SP2f6E1JcEhttps://prnt.sc/K-SP2f6E1JcELast note : So how would you feel about negative reviews being removed? There is some strong basis for having a some post removed due to abuse or not being real.. but some of the remarks being made from users from all Levels from   a new player to veteran. I will edit the post if the images do not upload correctly

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: darkschneider78 on October 18, 2022, 07:18:02 PMLast note : So how would you feel about negative reviews being removed? There is some strong basis for having a some post removed due to abuse or not being real.. but some of the remarks being made from users from all Levels from   a new player to veteran. I will edit the post if the images do not upload correctlyWell deleting negative reviews rather, than working on how to make improvements is a major red flag and trying such casinos is actually at your own risk. And if you finally tried and you were lured with profits only to start making streams of loses just because you wanted a withdrawal, then I don't think you should continue playing but rather work and seek ways to withdraw your earnings if it ever gets possible.Most casinos are only there to scam and exploit from vunerable players who fall such cheap scams and I hope we all try to learn from the mistakes of others and be so sensitive enough to know when something isn't right . I always do alot of research as possible before dropping money into any site, and I do alot of review readings and most of my findings comes from past reviews, but  most times if the reviews are all positive for less than a year game, that also calls for an alarm, as there are possibilities of deleting the negative reviews or the reviews were manipulated

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Any legitimate platform (and by platform, I mean generally, not limited to casinos alone) should never be afraid of negative comments, Infact, I see it as a red flag each time a negative comment from a user is being or been deleted by the owner of that platform, this is exactly what scammers do, when you join a group that's managed or controlled by scammers, you notice that every negative(that's well structured negative comments) comment comments are always deleted almost immediately to prevent other potential victims from seeing it and backing out.So in the same vain, a casino that deletes negative comments from users (which is actually what they should build upon and become better in their services) is no different from scammers.

comments.author: Juwel
comments.body: BC game Totally scammerThey blocked my account with 115+ referrals - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5369644.msg58369512#msg58369512Also, they are afraid to answer, also they are not able to check what I did for them. totally scam site.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on October 20, 2022, 11:28:13 PMAny legitimate platform (and by platform, I mean generally, not limited to casinos alone) should never be afraid of negative comments, Infact, I see it as a red flag each time a negative comment from a user is being or been deleted by the owner of that platform, this is exactly what scammers do, when you join a group that's managed or controlled by scammers, you notice that every negative(that's well structured negative comments) comment comments are always deleted almost immediately to prevent other potential victims from seeing it and backing out.So in the same vain, a casino that deletes negative comments from users (which is actually what they should build upon and become better in their services) is no different from scammers. It's very rampant in the altcoin groups but it should not be here in Cryptocurrency casinos we have a dedicated community here and every piece of news about a particular casino's action is not taken for granted, if they are deleting comments without good reason then that's already a warning sign, they should first and foremost take action or address, deleting is not a solution it will aggravate the issue by letting other people know of their action, there's a lot of positive and negative feedbacks on BC.game lately but negative feedbacks are the ones that the community takes seriously.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I just registered on their site last night but haven't made any deposit there just to see what is interesting to play there, but after seeing this thread I will think about playing before there is an explanation from the bc games team about this case, but as my experience if you it doesn't violate the rules, you can contact their service support so that your problem can be immediately resolved, but if you can't make this a lesson to be more careful when playing gambling sites like this, if I get a little win in the game I usually always withdraw money there and never put big money on any gambling site or casino for fear of withdrawal problems like thisQuote from: Juwel on October 26, 2022, 08:41:23 AMThey blocked my account with 115+ referrals - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5369644.msg58369512#msg58369512I hope you don't cheat or break their rules, those 115 referrals can make a lot of money if they play as active gamblers, if I were you and make bonus profits from those referrals of course I will continue to withdraw my money every time without having to accumulate it into money which is very big there, worried that such unwanted troubles will occur

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: darkschneider78 on October 18, 2022, 07:18:02 PM<................>Only two reasons why they do that first they are not legitimate and the only thing they aim for is to scam many gamblers through their sites. Second is the gambler itself because some gamblers cheat to claim big rewards from the gambling sites and that's the reason why the facilitator of that sites hold or block your account because they have suspicious you. And in your case OP I do hope that your not cheating.

comments.body: Quote from: Juwel on October 26, 2022, 08:41:23 AMBC game Totally scammerThey blocked my account with 115+ referrals - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5369644.msg58369512#msg58369512Also, they are afraid to answer, also they are not able to check what I did for them. totally scam site.You already have a scam complaint in the scam section why bring your concern here you are spamming this thread OP is discussing his experience on BC.Game, although you have a different experience from OP, he is showing proof of his withdrawal if he thinks that Bc.game is a good casino he has a reason and he shows proof of that just as you have a reason why you think this casino is a scam but you need to respect every discussion here.

I will edit the post if the images do not upload correctlyI joined BC.GAME about a week ago based on the reviews online the platform is nothing short of amazing and could potentially be a top tier online casino, then you go back and actually read those reviews and how fake and generic they sound is when you realise that you’ve been fooled. You’re right they DO remove genuine comments made on their comment wall that logically states why their site IS NOT “provably fair” but replace those comments made with fake positive reviews. Just claiming to be “fair and transparent” is mind blowing how contradictory that statement is.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: I think bc game is always skeptical about their website and how they approach towards their users. I don’t know how but BC games has one of the highest investment in marketing and promoting their website. I could at least see one to two ads here and there all the time. Specially they are highly active in the paid to sites and keep getting users registered from those sites. I am not sure how fair or true this information is but an official must attend to this so that fellow members can understand the reality and gravity of the matter. Obviously clarity is prime thing when you play on online casino websites.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: darkschneider78 on October 18, 2022, 07:18:02 PM...As I know BC has provably fair games and you can test them on third-party sites, so with different verifiers, there's not so much space for rigging. When it comes to their in-house games...But, to be honest, I am missing a point in this post! Did you make a deposit? And why on these images there's just "EOS zero balance"? Where is your betting history, where are your transactions?I am playing on BC for so long and I never had a similar situation. Somehow I think that OP is not fully honest, he presented some images but I don't think just the ones we can see... where are the others? This is not a complete story...
